description.value: Moderate Curse: Those who arouse Nivi's wrath find themselves bound to the earth with no place to hide. You are wreathed in constant @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Faerie Fire]{Faerie Fire} and constantly affected by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Earthbind]{Earthbind}, and any effect that grants @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Invisible]{Invisibility} doesn't work on you.
